animeDescription: The stage is set on a moon of Planet Cray, "Aniversario." To develop the moon, Selca summons Aichi, Chrono and friends. A large undertaking by familiar vanguard characters!  (Source: Official Site)
animeStaff: [['Nishiyama Tsukasa', ['Director']], ['Takadera Takeshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Nakajima Naotoshi', ['Script', 'Series Composition']], ['Quily', ['Original Creator']]]
